ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:50:29 [Issue ID 4000-796942] urn:comicvine:4000-796942 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:51:46. [Issue ID 2142116]
ComicInfo.Summary: In Australia, Constantine, Swamp Thing, Bobo, and Zatanna face the threat of a zombified Plastic Man, and receive unexpected aid from the Penguin, Maxwell Lord, and Simon Stagg. However, Etrigan appears to warn of a coming threat from Trigon. Meanwhile in Gotham City, Damian reunites with Gordon, and Jon recovers from his injuries with the help of Doctor Fate and Mary Marvel.
